entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 before morning. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
